title: I want a friend
body: I am a Japanese, I just moved to Oceania server. I want a lot of friends because my friends are 0 people. Let's play together. nice to meet you! ! !{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: eh you can add me if you wish, I like that Raka picture you chose to use.
Add me! I'd love another person to play with
No I love you more! Be my friend ;)
I love you be my friend
